name: Ambrosia
detailed_description:
In order to rescue her captured friend, the apprentice priestess, Frode, heads to the isle of Cerbes.

But now that she's there, she must work and fight to earn enough money to get by on the isolated island.

Luckily for her, she has a deity lending its power to protect her from the evil she'll encounter.

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Explore an Open-ended Fantasy World
  • Traditional Turn-based Combat
  • Priestess Level System - Increase people's faith to unlock new skills!

short_description: The apprentice priestess, Frode, heads to the isolated island of Cerbes, in search of her captured friend. Luckily for her, she has the blessing of a deity to help protect her from the evil that she'll encounter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Ambrosia contains strong language and partial nudity.
